channel.title: RunServer Error
channel.description:
im trying to run a server on a VPS 64 bit windows computer, i have JDK and JAVA installed on it, but when i try to start "runserver" it flashes across the screen. Im pretty sure this is the problem:
[code]java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server[/code] [code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
If someone knows how i can fix it, or if i need to set the MySql-Connector to a spefici type of java, then i'd greatly appreciate it.

item.title: RunServer Error
item.dc:creator: @v0x v0x
item.description:
@v0x wrote:

I added a pause in the .bat file and this is what error i got

'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: RunServer Error
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

change the 17 in 3.0.17 to 18 that should work

Read full topic
